articles.title: Using Nanoantibiotics to Counter Antibiotic Resistance Gains US Patent - AZoNano
articles.description: Over 2.8 million Americans get antibiotic-resistant bacterial infections each year, and about 35,000 of those patients do not make it through their infection, according to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.
